job.title: Software Engineer II (React/Gatsby)
job.description: fearless is looking for a ltstronggtsoftware engineer ii react ltstronggtto add to our diverse team of employees and countingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhat youll be doingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwere looking to change the world by building software with a soul and we want your help this program is within our museums division supporting a culturally significant programltbrgtltbrgtthe software engineer ii develops maintains and enhances complex software systems that solve customer and user problems this role brings breadth across software development skills and depth in specific technologies like languages and frameworks that allows them to build effective software solutions the software engineer ii shares in the responsibility with other software engineers and team members to deliver maintainable solutionsltbrgtltbrgtwe need your coding skills what other skills will help you succeed at fearless glad you asked were excited about candidates who can accomplish the followingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtresponsibilities and contributionsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtcoaches and mentors others to develop their professional skillsltligt ltligttakes initiative for their own growth through personal leadershipltligt ltligtdecomposes tasks into discrete objectives to serve the strategic direction of the team ltligt ltligtbuilds software solutions with minimal direction in the form of maintainable code in accordance with the projectorganization technical standardsltligt ltligtdelivers complete software solutions that function well within the full system including documentation and automated unitintegration testsltligt ltligtdebugs existing software and corrects defectsltligt ltligtperforms manual exploratory testing individually and with the team as appropriate for the project test strategyltligt ltligtadvises the team on specific implementation options that meet business requirementsltligt ltligtcontributes actively in team agile processes through collaboration discussion andor preparationltligt ltligtprovides feedback to improve the teams technical proceduresltligt ltligtcollaborates with other engineers and designers to implement features that meet design specifications and deliver business valueltligt ltligtcontributes during all phases of the development lifecycle from task creation to production deployment of new codeltligt ltligtcoaches others on the team through code reviewsltligt ltligtseeks and engages peerreviews of tasks and deliverables coaches others when reviewing their tasks and deliverablesltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtessential skills experience and competenciesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtproficient in webdevelopment including frontend browser and backend server including ui components clientserver integrations apis and data persistence ltligt ltligtknowledgable with react preferably gatsby and scssltligt ltligtknowledgeable of accessibility complianceltligt ltligtproficient in at least one programming language and associated framework such as nodejs express python djangoflask go java springio ruby ruby on railsltligt ltligtproficient with important libraries and technologies in the ecosystem of programming language expertiseltligt ltligtproficient with the unit testing frameworks appropriate to the language of expertiseltligt ltligtproficient with html javascript and ability to quickly translate designs into well structured markup and maintainable cssltligt ltligtproficient with at least one frontend technology like ltstronggtreactltstronggt angular vue ember backbone svelteltligt ltligtexperience with building applications in containerized development environmentsltligt ltligtexpert in basic git actions like cloning creating branches navigating between branches staging code for commit committing code resetting and mergingltligt ltligtdemonstrated interest in and ability to learn new systems and technology quicklyltligt ltligtability to discuss technical tasks and team process topics with team members and outside stakeholdersltligt ltligtproficiency with advanced git actions like rebasing squashing and cherrypickingltligt ltligtability to operate and manage work strategically reason and build relationships and influence othersltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtcompensationltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe believe in paying people fairly so weve established a compensation model that ensures everyone at fearless regardless of race ethnicity gender sexual orientation disability religion age nationality or negotiation skills is given equal pay for equal workltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtso whats nextltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtover the years weve honed a step interview process that helps ensure that every employee we hire is the right fit for us and that were the right fit for them if we think youre a good fit well get in touch and start scheduling your interviewsltbrgtltbrgtltulgt ltligtltstronggtculture add interviewltstronggt were a peoplefirst company so we always start off by getting to know more about you how you work what your career goals are and what youre passionate about this is your opportunity to ask questions and get a feel for fearless so dont be shyltligt ltligtltstronggttechnical interviewltstronggt this is where we get into the nitty gritty of the project during the technical interview youll be interviewed by our passion coaches andor the teams project lead to make sure your skills align with the project requirementsltligt ltligtltstronggtbusiness interviewltstronggt at this point youve made it to the final frontier the business interview is when youll meet with fearless leadership to dot the is cross the ts and determine whether or not well be moving forward with the hiring processltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtwhy fearlessltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtour people make us who we are we believe that every member of the fearless team has something to share and we value the unique viewpoint youll bring to our community but we value ltemgtyour ltemgtcommunity too so we offer fulfilling work that stays in balance with the rest of life because everyone has different needs desires and goals our benefits offer the choices and flexibility that our team members need to live well and succeed here are a few highlights of our benefits packageltbrgtltbrgtltulgt ltligtflexible scheduleltligt ltligtfamilyfriendly workplaceltligt ltligt weeks accrued pto week sick leave federal holidays your birthday offltligt ltligt coverage of the employeeonly premium for hsa hmo or ppo plan and employee wellness planltligt ltligttech education training and snack allowancesltligt ltligtfree parking in downtown baltimore public transit coverageltligt ltligtsafe harbor k plan with employer contributionsltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtabout fearlessltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtfearless is a fullstack digital services firm in baltimore that delivers sleek modern and userfriendly software designed to push the boundaries of possibility its our mission to build software with a soul tools that empower communities and make a difference so we can create a world where good software powers the things that matterltbrgtltbrgtthats not our only goal though we also strive to create a purple culture that makes our employees excited to come to work every day thats why we encourage our employees to pursue their passions both in and out of the office with builtin company mentoring continuing education support flexible schedules and a familyfriendly work environment weve created a culture that allows our team to thrive professionally and personallyltbrgtltbrgtfearless believes in equal opportunity employment we wont discriminate against any employee or applicant on the basis of race gender nationality age religion disability military status or sexual orientation as a company and as individuals were committed to providing an inclusive and welcoming environment for our team our family members our clients our subcontractors and our vendors
